feature.name: daily wage calculator
feature.description: Operational reality summary for "daily wage calculator" based on Jira evidence: - Findings / issues / limitations: 1 - Troubleshooting / edge cases / requests: 1

findings.group_description: Multiple divisor options exist for daily wage calculation, creating configuration complexity
findings.issue_explanation: Users can choose between calendar days, working days, and custom days for calculating daily wage
findings.limitation_statement: Multiple calculation methods might lead to inconsistent payroll processing

troubleshooting.group_description: How to configure daily wage calculation divisor options
troubleshooting.workaround_or_resolution: Navigate to Settings > Payroll > Daily Wage Calculation, select desired calculation basis (calendar days, working days, or custom days), save changes

glossary.definition: The number of days used to calculate daily wage rate, which can be calendar days, working days, or a custom number of days
